get.description: 获取指定命名空间下指定ConfigMap的详细信息

post.description: 创建新的 ConfigMap 或更新已存在的 ConfigMap

200.description: 操作成功，返回成功消息

delete.description: 删除指定命名空间下的指定ConfigMap

get.description: 获取指定命名空间下的所有ConfigMap列表
获取集群中单个 Node 信息

put.description: 为单个 Node 添加 label

get.description: 获取集群中所有 Node 信息
集群中某个节点下的所有 Pod

put.description: 集群中某个节点的污点更新

post.description: 创建新的Pod或更新已存在的Pod

200.description: 操作成功，返回成功消息

delete.description: 删除指定命名空间下的指定Pod

get.description: 获取指定命名空间下指定Pod的详细信息

200.description: 返回Pod的详细信息，包含基础信息、卷配置、网络配置、初始化容器和主容器配置

get.description: 获取指定命名空间下的所有Pod列表

200.description: 返回Pod列表，每个Pod包含名称、就绪状态、运行状态、重启次数、运行时长、IP和所在节点

get.description: 获取所有可用的命名空间列表

200.description: 返回命名空间列表，每个命名空间包含名称、创建时间和状态

post.description: 搜索指定命名空间下的指定Pod

get.description: 获取指定命名空间下指定Secret的详细信息

post.description: 创建新的 Secret 或更新已存在的 Secret

200.description: 操作成功，返回成功消息

delete.description: 删除指定命名空间下的指定Secret

get.description: 获取指定命名空间下的所有Secret列表

privileged.description: Whether to enable privileged mode (e.g. root)

enable.description: Whether to turn on the probe

failureThreshold.description: Threshold number of probes to consider a probe failure

initialDelaySeconds.description: Initialize for a number of seconds before starting the probe

successThreshold.description: Threshold number of probes to consider a probe successful

mountPath.description: Mounted volume -> path in the corresponding container

node.description: Which Node the Pod is dispatched to

effect.description:
Required. The effect of the taint on pods
that do not tolerate the taint.
Valid effects are NoSchedule, PreferNoSchedule and NoExecute.

key.description: Required. The taint key to be applied to a node.

timeAdded.description:
TimeAdded represents the time at which the taint was added.
It is only written for NoExecute taints.
+optional

value.description:
The taint value corresponding to the taint key.
+optional

effect.description:
Effect indicates the taint effect to match. Empty means match all taint effects.
When specified, allowed values are NoSchedule, PreferNoSchedule and NoExecute.
+optional

key.description:
Key is the taint key that the toleration applies to. Empty means match all taint keys.
If the key is empty, operator must be Exists; this combination means to match all values and all keys.
+optional

operator.description:
Operator represents a key's relationship to the value.
Valid operators are Exists and Equal. Defaults to Equal.
Exists is equivalent to wildcard for value, so that a pod can
tolerate all taints of a particular category.
+optional

tolerationSeconds.description:
TolerationSeconds represents the period of time the toleration (which must be
of effect NoExecute, otherwise this field is ignored) tolerates the taint. By default,
it is not set, which means tolerate the taint forever (do not evict). Zero and
negative values will be treated as 0 (evict immediately) by the system.
+optional

value.description:
Value is the taint value the toleration matches to.
If the operator is Exists, the value should be empty, otherwise just a regular string.
+optional
